queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/domain
| csv _raw extract 1 as rfitem, 2 as rfrisk, 4 as rfpayload
| if ( isNull(rfrisk), "undefined", rfrisk ) as rfrisk
| where !( rfrisk contains "undefined")
| count by rfrisk
| sort by rfrisk

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/domain
| csv _raw extract 1 as rfitem, 2 as rfrisk, 4 as rfpayload
| if ( isNull(rfrisk), "undefined", rfrisk ) as rfrisk
| concat ("https://api.recordedfuture.com/v2/domain/", itemname,"?fields=riskMapping%2Crisk%2Ccounts") as baserf
| tourl(baserf, "lookup-on-recorded-future") as recordedfuture
| fields - baserf
| where !( rfrisk contains "undefined")
| count by rfitem, rfrisk, recordedfuture
| sort by rfrisk, _count
| fields - _count
| limit 10

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/hash
| csv _raw extract 1 as rfhash, 2 as rfhashrtype, 3 as rfrisk, 4 as rfpayload
| if ( isNull(rfrisk), "undefined", rfrisk ) as rfrisk
| where !( rfrisk contains "undefined")
| count by rfrisk
| sort by rfrisk

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/hash
| csv _raw extract 1 as hashname, 2 as algo, 3 as risknum, 4 as riskstring, 5 as riskdetails
| json field=riskdetails "EvidenceDetails[0].CriticalityLabel" as Label
| concat ("https://api.recordedfuture.com/v2/hash/", itemname,"?fields=riskMapping%2Crisk%2Ccounts") as baserf
| tourl(baserf, "lookup-on-recorded-future") as recordedfuture
| fields - baserf
| count_distinct(hashname) by hashname, Label, recordedfuture
| fields - _count_distinct
| limit 10
| sort by Label asc

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/hash
| csv _raw extract 1 as rfhash, 2 as rfhashtype, 3 as rfrisk, 4 as rfpayload
| where !( isBlank(rfhashtype) ) 
| count by rfhashtype

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/url
| csv _raw extract 1 as rfurl, 2 as rfrisk, 3 as payload
| if ( isNull(rfrisk), "undefined", rfrisk ) as rfrisk
| where !( rfrisk contains "undefined")
| count by rfrisk
| sort by rfrisk

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/ip
| "{{risknumber}}" as risknumber
| csv _raw extract 1 as rfitem, 2 as rfrisk, 3 as rfriskstring, 4 as rfriskdetails
| json field=rfriskdetails "EvidenceDetails[0].Name" as reason
| where rfrisk > risknumber
| count_distinct(rfitem) by rfitem, rfrisk, reason
| concat ("https://api.recordedfuture.com/v2/ip/", rfitem,"?fields=risk%2Crawrisk%2CriskMapping") as baserf
| tourl(baserf, "lookup-on-recorded-future") as recordedfuture
| fields - baserf
| fields - _count_distinct
| limit 10
| sort by reason asc

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/ip
| csv _raw extract 1 as ipaddress, 2 as risknum, 3 as riskstring, 4 as riskdetails
| where risknum >= {{risknumber}}
| json field=riskdetails "EvidenceDetails[0].Name" as reason
| count by ipaddress
| geoip ipaddress
| count by longitude, latitude

sourceDefinition.query:
_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/ip
| csv _raw extract 1 as rfitem, 2 as rfrisknum, 3 as rfriskstring, 4 as rfriskdetails
| count_distinct(risknum) by risknum

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/*
| parse field=_sourceCategory "*/*/*" as vendor, feedtype, feedmap
| count by feedmap

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/url
| hash(_raw, "sha2_256") as message_checksum
| count_distinct(message_checksum) by message_checksum
| sum(_count_distinct) as total_count

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/domain
| hash(_raw, "sha2_256") as message_checksum
| count_distinct(message_checksum) by message_checksum
| sum(_count_distinct) as total_count

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/hash
| hash(_raw, "sha2_256") as message_checksum
| count_distinct(message_checksum) by message_checksum
| sum(_count_distinct) as total_count

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/vulnerability
| hash(_raw, "sha2_256") as message_checksum
| count_distinct(message_checksum) by message_checksum
| sum(_count_distinct) as total_count

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/ip
| hash(_raw, "sha2_256") as message_checksum
| count_distinct(message_checksum) by message_checksum
| sum(_count_distinct) as total_count

_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes
| where _sourceCategory="sourcecategory_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<sourcecategory>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"sizeInBytes\"\:(?<bytes>\d+),\"count\"\:(?<count>\d+)\}" multi
| bytes/1024/1024/1024 as gbytes 
| timeslice 1d
| sum(gbytes) as daily_ingest_gbytes by _timeslice, sourceCategory
| where sourceCategory contains "recordedfuture"
| where !( sourceCategory contains "schema" )
| transpose row _timeslice column sourceCategory

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/url
| csv _raw extract 1 as rfurl, 2 as rfrisk, 4 as rfpayload
| if ( isNull(rfrisk), "undefined", rfrisk ) as rfrisk
| where !( rfrisk contains "undefined")
| count by rfrisk
| sort by rfrisk

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/url
| csv _raw extract 1 as urlname, 2 as risknum, 3 as riskstring, 4 as riskdetails
| json field=riskdetails "EvidenceDetails[0].Name" as reason
| concat ("https://api.recordedfuture.com/v2/domain/", itemname,"?fields=riskMapping%2Crisk%2Ccounts") as baserf
| tourl(baserf, "lookup-on-recorded-future") as recordedfuture
| fields - baserf
| count_distinct(ipaddress) by urlname, reason, recordedfuture
| fields - _count_distinct
| limit 10
| sort by reason asc

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/domain
| csv _raw extract 1 as rfitem, 2 as rfrisk, 3 as rfriskstring, 4 as riskdetails
| if ( isNull(rfrisk), "undefined", rfrisk ) as rfrisk
| where !( rfrisk contains "undefined")
| count by rfrisk
| sort by rfrisk

_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/vulnerability
| csv _raw extract 1 as rfitem, 2 as rfrisk, 3 as rfriskstring, 4 as rfriskdetails
| json field=rfriskdetails "EvidenceDetails[0].Name" as reason
| json field=rfriskdetails "EvidenceDetails[0].RuleCategory" as rulecategory
| json field=rfriskdetails "EvidenceDetails[0].CriticalityLabel" as criticality
| count_distinct(rfitem) by rfitem, rulecategory, criticality
| fields - _count_distinct
| concat ("https://web.nvd.nist.gov/view/vuln/detail?vulnId=", rfitem) as basenist
| tourl(basenist, "lookup-on-nist") as nist
| concat ("https://api.recordedfuture.com/v2/vulnerability/", rfitem,"?fields=risk%2Crawrisk%2CriskMapping") as baserf
| tourl(baserf, "lookup-on-recorded-future") as recordedfuture
| fields - baserf, basenist
| limit 20
| 1 as critvalue
| if ( criticality = "High", 3, if ( criticality = "Medium", 2, if ( criticality = "Low", 1, critvalue ))) as critvalue
| sort by critvalue
| fields - critvalue

sourceDefinition.query:
_sourceCategory=recordedfuture/map/vulnerability
| parse "\"*\",\"*\",\"*\",\"*\"" as item, risknum, rulenum, details
| count_distinct(risknum) by risknum
